name: Sex Diary - Swingers Yacht
description:
Ryan and Lisa are all about a great time.
That’s why they have decided to tie the knot on a private Island in the middle of the Pacific, inviting every single one of their crazy friends and even crazier family members for a week to remember.
Six days of pure bliss: relaxing under the warm sun, swimming in the shallow waters, eating and drinking the local flavors, all culminating with the big day!
Twenty four hours of drinking, dancing ( and yes, probably fucking ) in the craziest and noisiest wedding party the Island ever had.
But when that special week turns into a never ending drinking and dancing frenzy from day one, with absolutely no time to enjoy each other, they decide to take the yacht out for a nocturnal getaway, miles away from the prying eyes of their crazy families.
Their plans were about to be ruined when they found out their only skipper was drunk and in no position to sail.
Lucky for them, Ryan’s buddy Drake and his fiancee Aiko were fooling around on the beach and saw them sneaking on the Yacht.
Drake was not only an esteemed sailor, but also a very generous lover.
He couldn’t pass up a perfect opportunity to make love to his young fiancee on a luxury Yacht.
Both men have big plans for tonight, each with his soon to be wife.
Will they manage to keep them to themselves?
Or will the girls have other fun ideas?
Follow the story and find out…
